weeks.title: Week 1
topics: Introduction to the Command Line Interface
Basic commands: cd, ls, mkdir, rm, cp, mv, touch, etc.
Basic text processing commands: cat, grep, sed, awk
Combining commands with pipes for more complex tasks

weeks.title: Week 2
topics: Shebang (#!) and setting up the interpreter
Working with variables and environment variables

weeks.title: Week 3
topics: Introduction to Version Control and Git
Setting up Git on the local machine
Checking the status of the repository

weeks.title: Week 4
topics: Pushing and pulling changes to/from remote repositories
Forking and contributing to open-source projects
Creating and reviewing pull requests on GitHub
Understanding best practices in version control

weeks.title: Week 5
topics: Assign a small project to students to apply their knowledge
Regular code reviews and feedback sessions
